content.new:
I just installed the simulator locally, with the instructions at [#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall) and checking out the `urban_circuit` branch.

The instructions don’t specify a version for `ros-melodic-ros1-ign` so I got the latest as of today, `0.7.1-11`

Looks like the `subt_ros/vehicle_topics.launch` file is looking for `ros1_ign_bridge`, but the name has been changed to `ros_ign_bridge`.

Thus I get the familiar \(from other issues like #89 and #99\)

```
ERROR: cannot launch node of type [ros1_ign_bridge/parameter_bridge]: ros1_ign_bridge
ROS path [0]=/opt/ros/melodic/share/ros
ROS path [1]=/home/robot/subt_ws/install/share
ROS path [2]=/opt/ros/melodic/share
```

I downgraded to 0.7.0 but still have the issue - I’m not sure when the change was made.
